ygData.subject: Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: I went thru kithicor today and ... no more undead. As for what they dropped yesterday, the NORMAL undead spawns dropped Tainted weapons of all varieties,
ygData.messageBody:
I went thru kithicor today and ... no more undead.

As for what they dropped yesterday, the NORMAL undead spawns dropped
"Tainted" weapons of all varieties, (1hs, 2hs, piercing, 1hb, 2hb) the
only one I heard stats on was:

Tainted Rapier, Piercing, Dam 19 delay 5,several +5 stat bonuses and
-5sv disease.

All the weapons were no-drop, and I didn't get a chance at any of them.

Side note: everyone in the zone was saying "I hope hope leave it this
way forever" just like last week in Lake rathe when the pets were
spawning like crazy and everypne was saying "I hope it stays this way".
TWO examples of people LOVING a zone, BOTH of which Verant KABONG'ed.
Makes you wonder if they really WANT us happy.


Uldar Ulfangson
25th bard, Rodcet Nife
